creator: StockNow
descriptionHtml:
StockNow helps you to watch latest stock price easily. It is very handy to find and see any stock price data in Dhaka Stock Exchange

Features:
- Share price
- Stock Alarm
- List of all stock in Bangladesh
- Trade information
- Fundamental information
- Manage Portfolio
- Chart
- Advance Chart
- Favorite Share list
- Many more features are coming on demand.
descriptionShort: Best app for watching realtime stock market data of Dhaka Stock Exchange

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added auto refresh on company details page.
- Fixed some other minor bugs.

StockNow helps you to watch latest stock price easily. It is very handy to find and see any stock price data in Dhaka Stock Exchange

Features:
- Share price
- Stock Alarm
- List of all stock in Bangladesh
- Trade information
- Fundamental information
- Manage Portfolio
- Chart
- Advance Chart
- Favorite Share list
- Many more features are coming on demand.
descriptionShort: Best app for watching realtime stock market data of Dhaka Stock Exchange

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly base Top Shares added
- Block Trade at a glance added
- Price Alarm history on notification
- Circuit value problem fixed
- Halt Share upper limit problem fixed
- Restart button added on More menu
- Technical Chart bug fixed
- Block trade value in cr added
- Page remain same after internet disconnect
- Some minor bug fixed and performance improve

Added more options on daily, weekly, monthly gainers.
Added list by year end
Added sort by pe on list options
Added easy chart reset button
Added category and sector on detail page.

Added screener.
Fixed some minor bugs.

title:
StockNow - Stock Exchange DSE
3.2.7

creator: StockNow
descriptionHtml:
StockNow streamlines the monitoring of the latest share bazar prices effortlessly, offering a convenient way to access and view stock price data from Dhaka Stock Exchange Ltd. (DSE)

Key Features:
-Share bazar prices from Dhaka Stock Exchange
-Stock alarms for timely updates
-Comprehensive list of all stocks in Bangladesh
-Trading information at your fingertips
-Fundamental stock details
-Portfolio management tools
-Interactive charts and advanced charting options
-Favorite share list for personalized tracking
-Screener/Advanced search functionality
-Stay informed about upcoming events
-Many more features tailored to your demands.

Experience the best in stock monitoring with StockNow – your go-to platform for Dhaka Stock Exchange Limited, ensuring you're always updated on the latest share bazar prices and stock market trends in Bangladesh.
descriptionShort: Dhaka Stock Exchange DSE at Your Fingertips. Explore BD's Share Bazar Excellence

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Improved performance and data update frequency.
